Verses: 1 aindhu Muzha Neelamum Aindhu Muzha Agalamumaaga Seeththim Maraththaal Balibeedaththaiyum Undupannuvaayaaga; Adhu Sadhuramum Moondru Muzha Uyaramumaayiruppadhaaga.
2 adhin Naalu Moolaigalilum Naalu Kombugalai Undaakkuvaayaaga; Adhin Kombugal Adhanode Egamaai Irukkavendum; Adhai Vengalath Thagattaal Moodavendum.
3 adhin Saambalai Edukkaththakka Sattigalaiyum Karandigalaiyum Kinnigalaiyum Muldhuratugalaiyum Neruppuchchattigalaiyum Undaakkuvaayaaga; Adhin Panimuttugalaiyellaam Vengalaththaal Pannuvaayaaga.
4 valaippinnal Pondra Oru Vengalach Challataiyaip Panni, Andhach Challataiyin Naalu Moolaigalilum Naalu Vengala Valaiyangalai Undaakki,
5 andhach Challatai Balibeedaththin Paadhiyuyaraththil Irukkumbadi Adhaith Thaazhap Balibeedaththin Sutradaippukkuk Keezhaaga Vaippaayaaga.
6 balibeedaththukkuch Seeththim Maraththaal Thandugalaiyum Panni, Avaigalai Vengalaththagattaal Mooduvaayaaga.
7 balibeedaththaich Sumakkaththakkadhaaga Andhath Thandugal Adhin Irandu Pakkangalilum Valaiyangalile Paaichchappattirukkavendum.
8 adhai Ul Velivittup Palagaigalinaale Pannavendum. Malaiyil Unakkuk Kaanbikkappattabadiye Adhaip Pannakkadavargal.

9 vaasasthalaththukkup Piraagaaraththaiyum Undupannuvaayaaga; Therke Thenthisaikku Edhiraana Piraagaaraththukkuth Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaal Seyyappatta Noorumuzha Neelamaana Thongudhiraigal Irukkavendum.
10 avaigalukku Vengalaththinaale Iruvadhu Thoongalum, Iruvadhu Paadhangalum Irukkavendum; Thoongalin Kokkigalum Avaigalin Poongalum Velliyinaal Seyyappadavendum.

11 appadiye Vadapakkaththin Neelaththirkum Noorumuzha Neelamaana Thongudhiraigal Irukkavendum; Avaigalukku Iruvadhu Thoongalum, Avaigalukku Iruvadhu Paadhangalum Vengalamaayirukka Vendum; Thoongalin Kokkigalum Poongalum Velliyinaal Seyyappadavendum.
12 piraagaaraththin Melpakkamaana Agalaththirku Aimpadhu Muzha Neelamaana Thongudhiraigal Irukkavendum; Avaigalukkup Paththuth Thoongalum, Avaigalukkup Paththup Paadhangalum Irukkavendum.
13 sooriyan Udhikkira Thisaiyaagiya Keezhppakkaththin Piraagaaram Aimbadhumuzha Agalamaayirukkavendum.
14 ange Oru Puraththirkup Padhinaindhu Muzha Neelamaana Thongu Thiraigalum, Avaigalukku Moondru Thoongalum, Avaigalukku Moondru Paadhangalum Irukkavendum.
15 marupuraththukkup Padhinaindhu Muzha Neelamaana Thongu Thiraigalum, Avaigalukku Moondru Thoongalum, Avaigalukku Moondru Paadhangalum Irukkavendum.

16 piraagaaraththin Vaasalukku Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Siththirath Thaiyalvelaiyaaich Seyyappatta Iruvadhumuzha Neelamaana Oru Thongudhiraiyum Adharku Naalu Thoongalum Avaigalukku Naalu Paadhangalum Irukkavendum.
17 sutrup Piraagaaraththin Thoongalellaam Velliyinaal Poon Kattappattirukkavendum; Avaigalin Kokkigal Velliyinaalum Avaigalin Paadhangal Vengalaththinaalum Seyyappattirukka Vendum.

18 piraagaaraththin Neelam Noorumuzhamum, Irupuraththu Agalam Aimpadhu Aimbadhu Muzhamum, Uyaram Aindhu Muzhamumaayiruppadhaaga; Adhin Thongalgal Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolinaal Seyyappattu, Adhin Thoongalin Paadhangal Vengalamaayirukkavendum.
19 vaasasthalaththukkaduththa Sagala Panividaikkuth Thevaiyaana Ellaap Panimuttugalum, Adhin Ellaa Mulaigalum, Piraagaaraththin Ellaa Mulaigalum Vengalamaayirukkavendum.
20 kuththuvilakku Eppozhudhum Erindhukondirukkumbadi Idiththup Pizhindha Thelivaana Oliva Enneyai Unnidaththil Konduvarumbadi Isravel Puththirarukkuk Kattalaiyiduvaayaaga.

21 aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Saatchi Sannidhikku Munnirukkum Thiraichcheelaikku Velippuramaaga Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Saayangaalam Thodangi Vidiyarkaalammattum Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Andha Vilakkai Eriyavaikkakkadavargal; Idhu Isravel Puththirarukku Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkakkadavadhu.
